thread.section_title: Sports Jobs and Sports Internships - WorkInSports.com
thread.title: Senior Producer (Audio) - Sports Media

title: Senior Producer (Audio) - Sports Media
text: Posted/Updated: 10-20-2015 Brief Job Description: Responsible for live and/or pre-recorded audio content for our LA Radio Shows. Works daily with the Program Director as well as other colleagues involved in the production of shows.   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
